column1: Art Institute of Chicago////The Art Institute of Chicago is a landmark Chicago spot that features both a nice modern decor and a very large art collection (including many prominent artists like Picasso
column4: Jackson Pollock and iconic paintings like American Gothic
column7: A Sunday on La Grande Jatte). Â I liked many of the works here
